title: A game of ‘Would You Rather’
itunes:title: A game of ‘Would You Rather’
description:
We decided to do a lighter episode this week. On instagram we asked you to propose some fun ‘would you rather’ scenarios and boy, did you deliver! Some are crazy (but for better or worse we still made our choice!), some are silly, and we definitely didn’t agree on everything. Which one of us would give up booze? Which one would give up travel? Who would rather have a lobster claw for an arm than a floor length white beard? What could make us give up books? What about quarantining forever? You can learn a lot about a person in a good game of WYR.  We hope this episode makes you laugh!

 

Obsessions:

  • Bug Bite Thing: Bugbitething.com
  • D.S. & Derga Candle - Holy Ficus
  • Our Place Pan

 

Instagram:

  • @cocktails4breakfast
  • @yourbestfriendjoey

 

We’re Reading:

  • American Royals 2: Majesty by Katharine McGee
  • How to be an Anti Racist (Audiobook) Ibram X. Kendi
  • Rodham: A Novel by Curtis Sittenfeld
  • Deadly Little Scandals by Jennifer Lynn Barnes
  • Party of Two by Jasmine Guillory
  • The Changeling by Victor LaValle

 

 

August Book Club:

  • The Comeback by Ella Berman

 

Sponsor:

  • Bon & Viv Spiked Seltzer

 

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more!

 

Like and subscribe to RomComPods. Available wherever you listen to podcasts. Visit Grace’s blog, The Stripe. New posts daily!

 

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Grace on Instagram @graceatwood and Becca @beccamfreeman.
